info: Uthenga wa ndemanga zotsatira za kadyedwe

status.lowRecalls: Ndemanga za kadyedwe kanu zipezeka mukamaliza ndi kutumiza mndandanda wa mafunso osachepera {minRecalls}.

title: Ndemanga zotsatira zakadyedwe zochokera ku {name} zokumbukira
missingFoods: Zakudya zonse mwatiuza kunena kuti zikusowa sizipezeka ku ndemanga za kadyedwe

physicalData.title: Zokhuzana ndi inu
physicalData.subtitle: Kuti tikupasena ndemanga ya zotsatira moyenelera, yankhani mafunso awa.

outputs.title: Zotsatira

download.title: Tsitsani PDF
download.subtitle: Tsitsani ndemanga zotsatira mu fayilo ya PDF. Zitenga ma sekandi ochepa,Chonde dikirani pang'ono.
download.sent: Fayilo ya ndemanga ya zotsatira ya sungidwa.

email.title: Tumizani emelo
email.sent: Tatumiza ndemanga ya zotsatira za kadyedwe kanu ku imelo yomwe mwatipatsa.

outputs.retry: Zotsatira za ndemanga zakadyedwe zapemphedwa, yeseraninsoni muma sekandi.

rating.title: Maganizo anu ndi otani pazotsatira zakadyedwe?
rating.comment: Tiuzeni zambiri pa maganizo a zotsatira zakadyedwe?

intake.estimated: Mulingo wa zakudya zomwe zayelekezedwa kuti mwadya

unitDescription.percentage_of_energy: Zotsatira pa mchere uwu zikuchokera pamchere wopereka mphamvu kuchokera kuzakudya ndi mulingo wazakudya omwe mwanena.
unitDescription.energy_divided_by_bmr: Ndemanga ya zotsatira ikuchokera kumchere womwe umapereka mphamvu womwe mwadya kugawidwa ndi momwe thuphi lanu limagwiritsira ntchito mphamvu kuyelekeza ndi mulingo womwe mumayenera kudya.
unitDescription.per_unit_of_weight: Ndemanga ya zotsatira ikuchokera kumchere wu pa kg ya kulemera kwa thuphi lanu kuyelekeza ndi mulingo womwe mumayenera kudya.
unitDescription.range: Ndemanga ya zotsatira pa mchere uwu ikuchokera kuzakudya ndi mulingo wazakudya omwe mwanena.
